content.text:
# Draft:Turbowarp

Turbowarp is a modification of Scratch. It is used to make Scratch games faster, better, and give them more extensions. It allows the user to create projects that that can not be acheived or as good as in turbowarp.
Interface & Extensions
The interface of turbowarp is very simular to scratch's. It included blocks, a stage where everything takes place, a paint editor, a sound editor, and more. A difference of scratch's though is the extensions. Scratch's is limited to Music, Pen, Video Sensing, Text to Speech, Translate, Makey Makey, micro:bit, Lego mindstorm EV3, lego boost, lego education WeDo 2.0, and Go direct force and Acceleration. While Turbowarp has no limitations, it contains a large library of extensions, but if you want any more, you could either program it in javascript or try to find it on the web.
Documentation & Links
{| class="wikitable"
|+Documentation (not all, just the most important ones)
!Link & Name
!Description
|-
|[https://docs.turbowarp.org/development/extensions/introduction Extension creation]
|A introduction to creating your own
|-
|[https://docs.turbowarp.org/how How turbowarp runs faster than scratch]
|Shows how turbowarp runs faster than scratch
|-
|[https://docs.turbowarp.org/custom-fps Custom FPS]
|talks about customising how some scripts are run
|}
{| class="wikitable"
|+Links (not all, just the most important ones)

|A page where you can customize your expirience. Simular to [https://scratchaddons.com/ ScratchAddons] but without the need to download the addon seperatly

|The turbowarp editor

|turns your project into a HTML file
